alert.note: Alert for Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 08 at 1:16PM MST until November 09 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST THIS EVENING THROUGH 2 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Upper North Platte River Basin. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST this evening through 2 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Light weight and high profile vehicles including light load semis and those towing camper trailers may be at risk.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means a hazardous high wind event is possible. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
